fpmExplorer:Page.title: Micro Chart
fpmExplorer:Page.introduction: The MicroChart building block enables you to render different types of micro charts.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Define UI.FieldGroup Annotation
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: To define the micro chart, you can use the UI.Chart annotation in your service definition. This annotation refers to a UI.DataPoint annotation.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Usage of Micro Chart Building Block
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: To use a micro chart, you need to define the metaPath pointing to a UI.Chart annotation.
